_aChangeLog.text: modified startzone trigger of all bonuses

_sText:
NOTE 03/30/17: fixed some triggers (b2 and start bhop)

IMPORTANT 04/28/17:

If you downloaded the map before, please be sure you have the latest version, it solves many issues.

Surf Forgotten is my third surf map. The main goal was to make an easy linear map, but I ended up finding some sorts of trick surfs that could be cool in it. I took advantage of this map to experiment many concepts that were new to me such as: reflections, HDR, opened map, easy linear surfing, multiple use of same ramps, 3D skybox, fog, etc. It was really fun to create. I have no expectation from this because it is not a common surf map (as the design lol) and it is very short as a linear, but I hope you will enjoy it as much as I enjoyed doing it! oooooh

Map: tier 1, linear, 6 bonuses.

Download link (css): http://gamebanana.com/maps/194789
Download link (csgo): http://gamebanana.com/maps/194790

Showcase video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XBuwBsSPDqU

Thanks to sneak, noobre and marcowmadeira for helping me on some issues.

Credits to TopHATTwaffle and Komaokc for the assets (and all the others too).
